name: Twilio Hackpack for Heroku and Flask
description: An easy-to-use repo to kickstart your Twilio app using Flask and deploy onto Heroku. Easy to clone, easy to tweak, easy to deploy.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: You can find this on your Twilio Account info page

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: You can find this on your Twilio Account info page

CALLER_ID.description: Outgoing Caller ID you have previously validated with Twilio

TWILIO_APP_SID.description: base URL of this application. Set this with the resolved success URL returned on successful setup
